body:
### Steps to reproduce

```
$ spack arch
darwin-bigsur-skylake
eschnett@redshift:~/Cactus (14:09:06)
$ uname -a
Darwin redshift.local 21.1.0 Darwin Kernel Version 21.1.0: Wed Oct 13 17:33:23 PDT 2021; root:xnu-8019.41.5~1/RELEASE_X86_64 x86_64 i386 MacBookPro16,1 Darwin
eschnett@redshift:~/Cactus (14:09:09)
$ spack --version
0.17.0-463-361a2ccdf6
```

### Error message

I am using macOS Monterey. Spack used to detect this correctly. Currently (after a `git pull`), my OS is detected as Big Sur (see above).

### Information on your system

```
$ spack debug report
* **Spack:** 0.17.0-463-361a2ccdf6
* **Python:** 3.8.8
* **Platform:** darwin-bigsur-skylake
* **Concretizer:** clingo
```

The platform is wrong; I'm on Monterey.

### General information

- [X] I have run `spack debug report` and reported the version of Spack/Python/Platform
- [X] I have searched the issues of this repo and believe this is not a duplicate
- [X] I have run the failing commands in debug mode and reported the output
title: Monterey misdetected as Big Sur
